rajawali.terrain

Class SquareTerrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.renderer.AFrameTask
      • rajawali.ATransformable3D
        • rajawali.Object3D
          • rajawali.terrain.Terrain
            • rajawali.terrain.SquareTerrain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Object3D>, IGraphNodeMember, INode

    public class SquareTerrain
extends Terrain
    This is a generic Terrain class for Rajawali.
    Author:
    Ivan Battistella (info@fenicesoftware.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SquareTerrain

        protected SquareTerrain(int divisions,
             double[][] terrain,
             Vector3[][] normals,
             double[][] temperature,
             double xScale,
             double zScale)
        Represents a Square Terrain centered at the center
        Parameters:
        divisions - Matrix dimension
        terrain - Altitude matrix
        temperature - Temperature matrix
        xScale - the scale of the x component
        zScale - the scale of the z component
